## take ownership

<br>


- #### Try to think ahead about where the pitfalls lie.

- #### Iterate on your process.

- #### What works? What makes using data easy, what makes it painful?

- #### What simple steps are most helpful?
    - standard taxonomies
    - controlled vocabularies
    - tidy data
    - simple format
    - etc. etc.

<br>

## take aways

- #### prepare it to share it
- #### I am an idiot
- #### human readable code and machine readable data
- #### better in the open

<br>

> #### make yourself the [most expendable member](http://www.datacarpentry.org/blog/soft-skills/) of you team!

## what we haven't covered

> ### How data intensive is your work likely going to be? You might want to work on programming and version control
